name: spring-boot-angular-monorepo
description: Full-stack monorepo with Spring Boot, Angular, PostgreSQL, and Redis

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:backend && rimraf frontend/dist frontend/.angular
scripts.clean:all:full: npm run clean:backend && rimraf frontend/dist frontend/.angular frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
